resources.string: I love to learn & discover new technologies everyday.
Postgraduate Expert in Blockchain and Bitcoin
Professor of the Security in Blockchain module, where I talk about the main security threats in Blockchain, as well as Smart Contract fortification and multiple system deployments.
Cloning Raspberry Pi SD on macOS
This guide shows the steps to clone all the SD content of a Raspberry Pi to back up or dump the content to another device. Also I show a trick to monitor the cloning process that can be very helpful.
